rules_text:
You may pay {U} and tap any number of untapped creatures you control with total power 3 or greater rather than pay this spell’s cost.
Put target creature into its owner’s library third from the top.
notes:
WU:
 - five or more artifacts
 - metalcraft
UB:
 - even MV only
 - Zombies
GU:
 - five or more alternate costs
 - fathom
UR:
 - all fliers
 - drakes/dragons
